text: Buzurgone az qavmi u, ki kufr varzida ʙudand, [dar posux] guftand: «Turo cuz ʙasare hammonandi xes nameʙinem va ʙa cuz furumojagoni mo [on ham nadonista va] nasancida [kasi digarero] nameʙinem, ki az tu pajravi karda ʙosad va ʙarojaton [hec] ʙartarie ʙar xud nameʙinem, ʙalki sumoro duruƣgu mepindorem»
